entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one they want to see. He is described as someone who lives in a place that has not been revealed to them.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is introduced as Professor McGonagall, carrying a large pile of books. She is described as someone who seems skeptical about the trio wanting to see Dumbledore.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the three students who want to see Professor Dumbledore. She is described as being brave in speaking up.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as one of the three students who want to see Professor Dumbledore. He is described as someone who swallows and seems uncertain about what to say.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the three students who want to see Professor Dumbledore. He is not described in detail but is part of the trio with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is introduced as an organization that sends urgent owls to people like Professor Dumbledore. It is described as being in London.

relationships.description: Harry wants to see Dumbledore, as mentioned by Hermione when she says 'We want to see Professor Dumbledore'.
Hermione also wants to see Dumbledore, as mentioned in the same sentence by Harry and Ron.
Ron is part of the trio that wants to see Dumbledore, as mentioned by Hermione when she says 'We want to see Professor Dumbledore'.
Professor McGonagall knows where Dumbledore lives and is able to tell the trio that he left ten minutes ago.
The Ministry of Magic sent an urgent owl to Dumbledore, which prompted him to leave for London immediately.
